If you're just starting out with your first website, our Essentials hosting package may just be the perfect solution for you. Not only does it include all the features you need to get your brand new site online and make it a success, but it also offers amazing value for money, starting at just £2.49 a month. It might be our cheapest hosting solution, but we can assure you we haven't skimped on quality. We'll get you started with a free .co.uk domain name on the house, unlimited bandwidth, plenty of web space and all the features you need to get your site up and running in a matter of minutes. And the best thing about it is that you won't need any technical knowledge to set up your blog or website.

When your site starts to grow and you need more flexibility and power, you can always upgrade to a higher package that comes with even more features and perks you'll love.
